text:
Pursuant to sec 305, the
Secretary of Labor has exempted certain states from the restrictions on
garnishment contained in sec 303. The list of exempt states along with the
terms and conditions of the exemptions is found in Reg 870.57. State Representatives
are listed in Reg 870.57(a). Their powers and duties are stated in Reg 870.55.
The state exemption on garnishment amounts does not apply to the prohibition
against discharge because wages were garnished for any one debt. (See FOH
52v01.)
